remarks: A lattice ordering is transitive.  Deduction version of ~ lattr . (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2012.)
statement:
lattrd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lattrd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lattrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. Lat ) $.
lattrd.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
lattrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
lattrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
lattrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> X .<_ Y ) $.
lattrd.6 $e |- ( ph -> Y .<_ Z ) $.
lattrd $p |- ( ph -> X .<_ Z ) $.
